summary:
This mod can allow your teammate give you healing when you are weak.


V1.2
This new vertion can save your setting for the chosen teammember.
Even After U Close the Game.
descriptionHtml:
*****************Description******************
[what is this?]
This mod can allow your teammate give you healing when you are weak.

Use it with my Mod : AutoLevelup for Teammates can bring you more fun!
AutoLevelup for Teammates vertion 1.7 
added AutolearnSpells_Function.
can allow your caster learn Greater Ward when his Restoration skills reach 50.
and learn Grand Healing when his Restoration skills reach 75.

you can download it in the link below
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3456
[how does it work?]
First, set teammates by pressing F1 or F2. You can have two teammates at the same time.

Case1:Once your teammates\' or your HP is below 40%, he or she will be healed.

      But one of your teammates has to have spell\"Close Wounds\".(You can add it by console code\"addspell B62EF\")
      (of course they don\'t have any,you can add them by console or waiting for my MOD_Autolevelup_for_Teammates vertion 1.7)

      and your teammate\'s MP has to be more than 90.

Case2:If there are more than two teammates are waiting for healing.

      They will be healed by group healing.
      But one of your teammates has to have spell \"Grand Healing\".(You can add it by console code\"addspell B62EE\")
      and your teammate\'s MP has to be more than 180.

[how to use it?]
step1: press console (~), select needed teammate via left mouse button, close console.
step2: press F1 or F2 to add him to your team tactics.
step3: start a combat.

*****************Installation******************


1. Script Dragon files are included in my files already.
2. Or you can Install Script Dragon from the below link
http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1292671-rel-script-dragon/page__st__20
3. Place tactics.asi and tactics.ini along with the other two files into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. 

******************Uninstalling******************
Delete tactics.asi and tactics.ini

******************Credit******************
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon.
author: Andy Stark
